descriptions:
["DescriptionWe are delighted to bring to the market this fantastic family home in a quiet location in Morella.       A Type C1 with full golf views within the prestigious development of Victory Heights.
FEATURES:
- Type C1
- 5 Bedrooms plus maid's
- Upgraded kitchen
- Upgraded marble flooring
- BUA; 4,334 sqft
- Golf course view
- Installed cctv system
- Covered parking
- Nearby the community pool 
- Shared gym
- Shared tennis / basketball courts
- Gated Community 24-hour security & maintenance
- Nearby town centre includes convenience stores, restaurants, a mosque
- A fabulous school and nursery located next to community
The stunning villa has been partially upgraded and is presented immaculately throughout. The kitchen has been upgraded with built in appliances and an island in the center. There is marble tiling throughout the ground floor. 
The ground floor briefly comprises; entrance hall with bathroom, downstairs guest bedroom with en-suite, dining room, spacious lounge with sliding doors to the rear garden, kitchen with shiny metal flooring, laundry room and a maids room with internal & external access.
On the upper floor there is stylish dark wood parquet flooring throughout. There are four double bedrooms all with fitted wardrobes an ensuite bathroom to the master and second bedroom and also a separate family bathroom. 
Externally there is a double garage to the front and a good sized garden to the rear overlooking the golf course.
Call our Victory Heights Specialist on +971504127168 to find out more."]

descriptions:
["DescriptionThis stunning Riviera Signature Villa is available for sale on the Palm Jumeirah in Dubai. Sitting on a great location with views over the sea towards the Atlantis Hotel which makes it a fantastic home for a family looking to enjoy life by the sea. The villa has been well-maintained both internally and externally by the owner.
• 5 bedrooms
• En-suite bathrooms
• BUA 7,000 sq ft
• Spacious living and dining room
• Maid's & driver's room
• Fully landscaped
• Private swimming pool
• Sea views
• Can be sold fully furnished or unfurnished
The main entrance foyer splits with the dining room and formal living room located on the right side along with the main family room at the back of the villa which makes it a large open plan area offering views of the pool and the open sea through the large windows. On the left side is a fully fitted kitchen complete with top appliances and a family room which can also be used as a home office or study room The maid’s room and laundry area are part of the back of the house behind the kitchen, while the driver’s room is located externally.
All Five-bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are located on the upper floor. The master suite has its own sitting area, walk-in closet, that leads to the balcony with views towards the Atlantis Hotel. All of the four-bedrooms are well-sized and complete with built-in wardrobes. A magnificent chandelier hangs from the ceiling through an open rotunda which looks down to the ground floor.
The villa leads directly from the garden down to the beach. Green landscaping, trees and tall palm trees surround the beautiful garden to provide additional for the residents of this stunning home, while a large swimming pool sits to the side of the villa."]
